owl:Ontology.dc:description: IRRIG is an Irrigation Ontology for experimentation in TSCF, Irstea Clermont-Fd.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Irrigation ontology for experimentation in TSCF

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A derivation is a transformation of an entity into another, an update of an entity resulting in a new one, or the construction of a new entity based on a pre-existing entity.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: wasDerivedFrom

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has manufacturer

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has model

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship providing the name of an entity (e.g., device)
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has name

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: AmountProperty - Amount aspect of an entity representing the quantity of the entity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Amount Property

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: CropGrowthDeduction - a defined class represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate a State of the irrig:ObservableProperty_crop_growth of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_crop. The Observation may be performed by an inference engine. Links to a State to describe what the result is. Links to a TemporalEntity to indicate when the result is valid and for how many time.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crop Growth Deduction
owl:Class.skos:example: A CropGrowthDeduction is made by the Software_agent Sensor based on human observation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: CropGrowthObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_crop_growth of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_crop. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_crop_growth to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_crop. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crop Growth Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A CropGrowthObservation that made by the CatherineRoussey Sensor (human observation or biology sensor).

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: CropGrowthState - A qualitative value of the CropGrowth Property which changes over time, summarizing a set of information about that Property. To evaluate the State of the Property, some Boundaries are defined.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crop Growth State
owl:Class.skos:example: A State V2 is linked to an individual of CropGrowth Property dedicated to maize crop. The V2 State is reached when two leaves are fully emerged with collars visible in a maize plant. The State appearance could be evaluated by human observation or by automatic method like the Growing Degree Unit (GDU).

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: CropWaterNeedDeduction - a defined class represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate a State of the irrig:ObservableProperty_crop_waterNeed of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_crop. The Observation may be performed by an inference engine. Links to a State to describe what the result is. Links to a TemporalEntity to indicate when the result is valid and for how many time.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crop Water Need Deduction
owl:Class.skos:example: A CropWaterNeedDeduction that made by the Software_agent Sensor based on observations made by tensiometer sensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: CropWaterNeedState - A qualitative value of the CropWaterNeed Property which changes over time, summarizing a set of information about that Property. To evaluate the State of the Property, some Boundaries are defined.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Crop Water Need State
owl:Class.skos:example: Example: The State No of the CropWaterNeed Property represents the fact that the crop does not need water. The State Yes of the CropWaterNeed Property represents the fact that the crop needs extra water.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: DelayDurationObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to calculate the number of delay days.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Delay Duration Observation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: GrowthProperty - Growth aspect (characteristic dimension) of an entity representing the physical development or the increasing in amount, number or size of the entity. The Growth aspect of an entity is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the entity. The Growth quality values should be expressed by a qualitative value such as States or by a quantitative value.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Growth Property
owl:Class.skos:example: CropGrowth is a GrowthProperty representing the physical development of crop.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: IntensityProperty - Intensity aspect of an entity representing the strength effect or the level of power per unit area of the entity. The Intensity aspect of the entity is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the entity. The Intensity quality value should be expressed by a qualitative value such as States or by a quantitative value.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Intensity Property
owl:Class.skos:example: RainIntensity is a IntensityProperty representing the strength effect of rain.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: IrrigationActuation - Act of carrying out an Irrigation (Actuation) Procedure to change the State of a Moisture ActuatableProperty of a Soil FeatureOfInterest using a watering Actuator. This act is performed during the context exploitation phase of a context aware system. Links to an Actuator to describe what made the Actuation and how; links to an ActuatableProperty to describe the target that the Actuation change; links to a FeatureOfInterest to detail what that property was associated with. When the act is performed based on a Deduction, it should be linked to this Deduction by the wasInfluencedBy property. Links to the Function that is triggered by the Actuation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Irrigation actuation
owl:Class.skos:example: An IrrigationActuation is made by Watering Valve Actuator, links to Soil30cmDepth FeatureOfInterest and its Soil30cmDepthMoisture ActuatableProperty.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: MoistureProperty - Moisture aspect of an entity representing the amount of water available inside the entity. The Moisture aspect of the entity is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the entity. The Moisture quality value should be expressed by a qualitative value such as States or by a quantitative value.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Moisture Property
owl:Class.skos:example: RootZoneMoistureLevel is a MoistureProperty representing the amount of water available around the soilâ€™s root zone area of a plant.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RainQuantityObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_rain_dailyTotalQuantity of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rain. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_rain_dailyTotalQuantity to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rain. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rain Daily Total Quantity Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A RainDailyTotalQuantityObservation is computed by the SoftwareAgent Sensor based on observations made by a pluviometer.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RainIntensityBoundary - Limit of a State of the RainIntensity Property. The value of the limit is a quantitative data. To store the value, the boundaryValue data property is used.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rain Intensity Boundary
owl:Class.skos:example: 10 mm is the value of the Quantity_low Boundary that distinguish the Light State from the Moderate State of the RainIntensity Property.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RainIntensityDeduction - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate a State of the irrig:Observable_rain_intensity of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rain. The Observation may be performed by an inference engine. Links to a State to describe what the result is. Links to a TemporalEntity to indicate when the result is valid and for how many time.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rain Intensity Deduction
owl:Class.skos:example: A RainIntensityDeduction that made by the Software_agent Sensor based on observations made by a pluviometer sensor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RainIntensityState - A qualitative value of the RainIntensity Property which changes over time, summarizing a set of information about that Property. To evaluate the State of the Property, some Boundaries are defined.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rain Intensity State
owl:Class.skos:example: Example: The State Light of the RainIntensity Property represents a fact that there is no enought rain to take any decision about irrigation.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RainQuantityObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of irrig:ObservableProperty_rain_quantity of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rain. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_rain_quantity to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rain. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rain Quantity Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A RainQuantityObservation that made by the Pluviometer Sensor.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RootZoneDailyAverageMoistureObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_rootZone_dailyAverageMoisture of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rootZone. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_rootZone_dailyAverageMoisture to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rootZone. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Root Zone Daily Moisture Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A RootZoneDailyAverageMoistureObservation is computed by the SoftwareAgent Sensor.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RootZoneMoistureLevelBoundary - Limit of a State of the RootZoneMoistureLevel Property. The value of the limit is a quantitative data. To store the value, the boundaryValue data property is used.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Root Zone Moisture Level Boundary
owl:Class.skos:example: 10 cbar is the value of the Tension_veryHigh Boundary that distinguish the Saturated State from the VeryHigh State of the RootZoneMoistureLevel Property.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RootZoneMoistureLevelDeduction - a defined class represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate a State of the irrig:ObservableProperty_rootZone_moistureLevel of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_rootZone. The Observation may be performed by an inference engine. Links to a State to describe what the result is. Links to a TemporalEntity to indicate when the result is valid and for how many time.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Root Zone Moisture Level Deduction
owl:Class.skos:example: A RootZoneMoistureLevelDeduction that made by the Software_agent.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: RootZoneMoistureLevelState - A qualitative value of the RootZoneMoistureLevel Property which changes over time, summarizing a set of information about that Property. To evaluate the State of the Property some Boundaries are defined.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Root Zone Moisture Level State
owl:Class.skos:example: The State Saturated of the RootZoneMoistureLevel Property represents a fact that the moisture in rootzone is saturated in water.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: SleepingDurationObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to calculate the number of sleeping days before the next irrigation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Sleeping Duration Observation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Soil30cmDepthDailyAverageMoistureObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil30cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil30cmDepth. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil30cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil30cmDepth. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil 30cm Depth Daily Average Moisture Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A Soil30cmDepthDailyAverageMoistureObservation is computed by the SoftwareAgent Sensor.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Soil30cmDepthDailyAverageMoistureObservation - a defined class represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil30cmDepth_dailyMoisture of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil30cmDepth. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil30cmDepth_dailyMoisture to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil30cmDepth. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil 30cm Depth Moisture Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A Soil30cmDepthMoistureObservation is made by the SoilTensiometer_01 Sensor placed at 30 cm depth in the soil.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Soil60cmDepthDailyAverageMoistureObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil60cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil60cmDepth. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil60cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil60cmDepth. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil 60cm Depth Daily Average Moisture Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A Soil60cmDepthAverageDailyMoistureObservation ismade by the SoftwareAgent Sensor.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Soil60cmDepthDailyAverageMoistureObservation - a defined class that represents act of carrying out an (Observation) Procedure to estimate or calculate a value of the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil60cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture of the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil60cmDepth. This act can be performed during the context acquisition or context processing phases of a context aware system. Links to a Sensor to describe what made the Observation and how; links to the irrig:ObservableProperty_soil60cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture to describe what the result is an estimate of, and to the irrig:FeatureOfInterest_soil60cmDepth. When the act is made during the context processing phase the entry values of the procedure should be linked to the Observation by the wasDerivedFrom property.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil 60cm Depth Moisture Observation
owl:Class.skos:example: A Soil60cmDepthMoistureObservation is made by the Tensiometer Sensor placed at 60 cm depth in the soil.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: StressProperty - Stress aspect of an entity representing the pressure inside the entity. The Stress aspect of the entity is intrinsic to and cannot exist without the entity. The Stress quality values should be expressed by a qualitative value such as States or by a quantitative value.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stress Property
owl:Class.skos:example: CropWaterNeed is a StressProperty representing the stress inside the plant when it needs extra water. It corresponds to the drought stress.

owl:Class.rdfs:label: Temperature Property
TemperatureProperty - Temperature aspect of an entity representing the measure of how hot or cold of the entity.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor that measures the rain fall.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Pluviometer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor that measures the soil moisture.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A sensor that measure weather conditions.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thermometer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An actuator that open the water valve.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Watering Valve

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Actuator_wateringValve_1 - an actuator controls the valve of a watering device nÂ° 01. The actuator indirectly affects soil moisture.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Actuator Watering Valve 01 Soil Moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rain_quantity_high - a boundary line of division between two states of Rain Intensity: Heavy and Moderate.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rain quantity high is 40mm.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary Rain Quantity High

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rain_quantity_low - a boundary line of division between two states of Rain Intensity: Moderate and Light.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rain quantity low is 10mm.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary Rain Quantity Low

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rain_quantity_maximum - a boundary line represents the maximal value that rain quantity cannot surpass.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rain quantity maximum is 90.0mm (even more than the word record which is 71.8mm)
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary Rain Quantity Maximum

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rain_quantity_maximum - a boundary line represents the minimal value that rain quantity cannot surpass.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rain quantity minimum is 0mm.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary Rain Quantity Minimum

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_tension_average - a boundary line of division between two states of RootZone MoistureLevel: Low and Average.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension average is 140.0 cbar or 1400.0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension Average

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_tension_high - a boundary line of division between two states of RootZone MoistureLevel: Average and High.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension high is 120.0 cbar or 1200.0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension High

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_tension_low - a boundary line of division between two states of RootZone MoistureLevel: VeryLow and Low.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension low is 150.0 cbar or 1500.0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension Low

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_moistureLevel_maximum - a boundary line represents the maximal value that RootZone Tension cannot surpass.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension maximum is 301cbar or 3010 mbar (even more than the possible value of Watermark can evalute which is 300 cbar).
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension Maximum

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_moistureLevel_minimum - a boundary line represents the minimal value that RootZone Tension cannot surpass.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension minimum is 0 cbar or 0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension Minimum

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_tension_saturation - a boundary line of division between two states of RootZone MoistureLevel: VeryHigh and Saturated.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension saturation is 10.0 cbar or 100.0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension Saturation

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_tension_veryHigh - a boundary line of division between two states of RootZone MoistureLevel: High and VeryHigh.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension very high is 70.0 cbar or 700.0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension VeryHigh

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
Boundary_rootZone_tension_veryLow - a boundary line of division between two states of RootZone MoistureLevel: Dry and VeryLow.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the value of boundary rootzone tension very low is 160.0 cbar or 1600.0 mbar.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Boundary RootZone Tension VeryLow

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_air - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents air.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Air

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
FeatureOfInterest_crop - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents crop. The crop needs to be irrigated.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, the crop is maize that growth in an Arvalis' plot in 2013.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Crop

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_delay - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents delay phenomenon.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Delay

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_rain - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents rain.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Rain

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_rootzone - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents rootzone soil of a plant.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Root Zone

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_sleeping - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents sleeping phenomenon.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Sleeping

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_soil30cmDepth - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents soil at 30cm depth.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Soil at 30cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: FeatureOfInterest_soil30cmDepth - an instance of the class sosa:FeatureOfInterest that represents soil at 60cm depth.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Feature Of Interest Soil at 60cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_air_dailyMaxTemperature - an instance of the class irrig:TemperatureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of max temperature per day of an air feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Air Daily Max Temperature

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_air_dailyMinTemperature - an instance of the class irrig:TemperatureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of min temperature per day of an air feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Air Daily Min Temperature

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_air_temperature - an instance of the class irrig:TemperatureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of temperature of an air feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Air Temperature

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_crop_growth - an instance of the class irrig:GrowthProperty and caso:Property that represents the observable property of growth of a crop feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Crop Growth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_crop_stage - an instance of the class irrig:GrowthProperty and caso:Property that represents the stage observable property of a crop feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Crop Stage

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_crop_waterNeed - an instance of the class irrig:StressProperty and caso:Property that represents the observable property of water need of an crop feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Crop Water Need

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Number of days that an watering is delayed.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Irrigation Delay

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_rain_dailyTotalQuantity - an instance of the class irrig:AmountProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of total quantity per day of a rain feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Rain Daily Total Quantity

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_rain_intensity - an instance of the class irrig:IntensityProperty and caso:Property that represents the intensity observable property of a rain feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Rain Intensity

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_rain_quantity - an instance of the class irrig:AmountProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the quantity observable property of a rain feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Rain Quantity

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_rootZone_dailyAverageMoisture - an instance of the class irrig:MoistureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of average moisture per day of a root zone feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Root Zone Daily Average Moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_rootZone_moistureLevel - an instance of the class irrig:MoistureProperty and caso:Property that represents the observable property of moisture level of a root zone feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Root Zone Moisture Level

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Number of days that the system is waiting until the next irrigation.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Sleeping Duration

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_soil30cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture - an instance of the class irrig:MoistureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of average moisture per day of a soil 30cm depth feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Soil 30cm Depth Daily Average Moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_soil30cmDepth_moisture - an instance of the class irrig:MoistureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of moisture of a soil 30cm depth feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Soil 30cm Depth Moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_soil60cmDepth_dailyAverageMoisture - an instance of the class irrig:MoistureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of average moisture per day of a soil 60cm depth feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Soil 60cm Depth Daily Average Moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: ObservableProperty_soil60cmDepth_moisture - an instance of the class irrig:MoistureProperty and sosa:ObservableProperty that represents the observable property of moisture of a soil 60cm depth feature of interest.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Observable Property Soil 60cm Depth Moisture

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Pluviometer_1 - a pluviometer measures the rain quantity nÂ° 01.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Pluviometer 1

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Pluviometer_2 - a pluviometer measures the rain quantity nÂ° 02.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Pluviometer 2

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: SoilTensiometer_1_30cm - a soil tensiometer measures the moisture at 30 cm depth nÂ° 01.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer 1 at 30cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: SoilTensiometer_2_30cm - a soil tensiometer measures the moisture at 30 cm depth nÂ° 02.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer 2 at 30cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: SoilTensiometer_3_30cm - a soil tensiometer measures the moisture at 30 cm depth nÂ° 03.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer 3 at 30cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: SoilTensiometer_4_60cm - a soil tensiometer measures the moisture at 60 cm depth nÂ° 04.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer 4 at 60cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: SoilTensiometer_5_60cm - a soil tensiometer measures the moisture at 60 cm depth nÂ° 05.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer 5 at 60cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: SoilTensiometer_6_60cm - a soil tensiometer measures the moisture at 60 cm depth nÂ° 06.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: Soil Tensiometer 6 at 60cm Depth

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_init - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the state of crop growth is temporary undefined.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth Init

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_r1 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop after reaching the â€œsilkingâ€ stage. This stage is also named R1.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth R1

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_r1d15 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop 15 days after reaching the â€œsilkingâ€ stage.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth R1d15

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_r5 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop after reaching the â€œdent stage within kernel containing 50% moistureâ€. This stage is also named R5
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth R5

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_r5hg45 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop after reaching the â€œdent stage within kernel containing 45% moistureâ€.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth R5hg45

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_v2 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop after reaching the crop stage â€œ5 leavesâ€, also named V2.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth V2

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_v7 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop after reaching the crop stage â€œ10 leavesâ€, also named V7.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth V7

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_growth_v7d20 - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop 20 days after reaching the stage â€œ10 leavesâ€.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Growth V7d20

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_waterNeed_init - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the state of crop water need is temporary undefined.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Water Need Init

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_waterNeed_no - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop does not need water.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Water Need No

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_waterNeed_notApplicable - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the state of crop water need has not been evaluated yet.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Water Need Not Applicable

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_waterNeed_unavailable - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop may need water soon.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Water Need Unavailable

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_crop_waterNeed_yes - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the crop needs water.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Crop Water Need Yes

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rain_intensity_heavy - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the rain intensity is heavy.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RainIntensity property reaches this state the open upper boundary is RQ_maximum and the close lower boundary is RQ_high.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Rain Intensity Heavy

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_rain_intensity_init - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the rain intensity is temporary undefined.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Rain Intensity Init

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rain_intensity_light - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the rain intensity is light.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RainIntensity property reaches this state the open upper boundary is RQ_low and the close lower boundary is RQ_minimum.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Rain Intensity Light

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rain_intensity_moderate - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the rain intensity is moderate.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RainIntensity property reaches this state the open upper boundary is RQ_high and the close lower boundary is RQ_low.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Rain Intensity Moderate

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_average - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the average state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_average and the close lower boundary is ST_high.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Average

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_dry - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the dry state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_maximum and the close lower boundary is ST_very_low.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Dry

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_high - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the high state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_high and the close lower boundary is ST_very_high.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level High

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: State_rootZone_moistureLevel_init - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is temporary undefined.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Init

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_low - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the low state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_low and the close lower boundary is ST_average.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Low

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_saturated - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the saturated state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_saturated and the close lower boundary is ST_minimum.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Saturated

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_veryHigh - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the very high state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_very_high and the close lower boundary is ST_saturated.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Very High

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment:
State_rootZone_moistureLevel_veryLow - an instance of the class caso:State that represents the root zone moisture level is at the very low state.
In the example of Arvalis' dataset, this RootZoneMoistureLevel property reaches this state the open upper boundary is ST_very_low and the close lower boundary is ST_low.
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: State Root Zone Moisture Level Very Low
